entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:36 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 9:24 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:24 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 9:24 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
